resources.string: Could not retrieve results. Please check your internet connection.

Thank you very much for using this app! 

 This unofficial app has no warranty whatsoever and has no official relationship with e621 staff. 

 Developed by Douglas Vanny Bento (me@beastarman.info)

Version 0.2a.6: Video Playback. Disable Sync or set custom interval. Sharing. 

 Version 0.2a: Stability. Full screen images. DText. Post comments. 

 Version 0.1a.8: Blacklists, Highlight tags, Thumbnail size and improved response time 

 Version 0.1a.4: Few bug fixes. Disable sync when not on Wifi. Faster navigation. 

 Version 0.1a.3: Improved transition between activities and fixed download buttons. 

 Version 0.1a.1: Fixed Urgent Error Reporting bug. 

 Version 0.1a: Everything.
Version %1$s is out! Would you like to upgrade?

Thank you very much for considering making a donation!

Check below for donation methods.

E621 Mobile lets you browse the whole E621 image database and even pick the images you like and download to your phone discretely. You can even search for them without any internet connection. \n\n To do that however, please visit the settings page and click "Force full metadata update". This will download the whole tag base from E621, allowing you to search for your downloads using tags. You can do it whenever you want.
It seems you have not downloaded any tags, so local searching may not work. Please go to the settings screen and click "Force full metadata update".

E621 Mobile is free and has no ads in order to provide the best possible experience, but all this work costs me money and time. Donations would help me feel motivated to work and keep improving this app on every possible way.
A .nomedia file was detected on %1$s. This prevents downloaded images from showing up on your gallery. Would you like to remove this file?
Something went wrong. Please don\'t hate me.

Video support arrived!
 Please keep in mind that Android currently does not support playback for some .webm files. 

 Sync can now have a custom interval or be disabled completely. 

 Posts now can be shared easily.

I send a huge thanks to everyone who trusted me their money. You can now find a list of everyone who did so on the Donation screen. \n\n Optional beta updates. You can now opt-in on the settings screen. (Not available in Play version).
